data.actual_result: Sometimes it takes an other option, and then it goes on your previous Option
data.expected_result: It should choose the right option, without any latency
data.short_description: Changing the time in the Prune section (might be because it's a large server, mine was 5k) is slow
data.steps_to_repro: - Go in the Server Settings (a large server would be preferable) - Go in the "Members" section - Tap the 3 dots on the top-right of the screen - Tap "Prune" - Change fast the options, so, tap on the first and on the second, the third and again, fast
